feat(pi-de): autocomplete UI for / commands and @ file references

- Monitors for / at start of line (requests commands) and @ anywhere (requests files)

- Mouse click/hover support for item selection
- Max 10 filtered results with scroll support
- Added listCommands/listFiles methods to RemoteAgent
- Added onCommandsList/onFilesList callbacks for response handling
- Updated types.ts with CommandInfo, FileInfo, and protocol types
- Wired Autocomplete component into App.tsx
- Added comprehensive tests for RemoteAgent methods and Autocomplete interactions
- All 200 tests passing

feat(protocol,pi-socket): add file attachment protocol and handler

- Add AttachFileRequest and AttachFileResponse to hyper-pi-protocol
- Add attach_file handler in pi-socket: decodes base64, validates file size (<10MB),
  sends as ImageContent or TextContent via pi.sendUserMessage()
- Send ack back to client after processing
- Update SocketEvent union to include AttachFileResponse
- Re-export new types from pi-socket/src/types.ts
- Add 5 comprehensive tests: text file, image file, oversized file rejection,
  ack response, closed connection handling
- hyper-pi-protocol build passes, pi-socket: 101 tests pass (94 existing + 7 new)

feat(protocol,pi-socket): Add file attachment protocol and handler

- Add AttachFileRequest and AttachFileResponse types to hyper-pi-protocol
- Add AttachFileRequest to SocketEvent union
- Implement file attachment handler in pi-socket:
  - Validates filename and content
  - Enforces 10MB max file size
  - Decodes base64 content and sends as ImageContent or TextContent
  - Uses pi.sendUserMessage() with appropriate deliverAs option
  - Sends acknowledgement back to client
- Add comprehensive tests for text/image attachment, oversized files, and ack
